docs.summary: Manage Pro Galleries

permissions.name: Manage Galleries
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's Pro Galleries.

docs.summary:
Creates a new gallery. 

> **Note:** When you create a new gallery with Create Gallery, the newly-created gallery is available only on a site's backend and doesn't appear on the live site.
> To display a backend gallery on a live site, the site owner needs to connect it manually to a gallery component. 
> To learn more about how a site owner can do this using Velo, see [Displaying a Pro Gallery on Your Site Using the Pro Gallery Backend API](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-tutorial-displaying-a-pro-gallery-on-your-site-using-the-pro-gallery-backend-api).

You can create an entirely new gallery, or clone an existing gallery using the `cloneFromGalleryId` parameter. 
When a gallery is cloned, the newly-created gallery includes the same properties as the existing gallery except for the gallery IDs, item IDs, sort order, and created and updated dates.

examples.title: Create a gallery

permissions.name: Manage Galleries
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's Pro Galleries.

docs.summary:
Creates a media item in a specified gallery.

 > **Note:** When creating or updating image items in a pro gallery, the images must be uploaded or imported to the [Wix Media Manager](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/media/media-manager) first, as the `imageInfo` parameter currently only supports the Wix Media URL.

examples.title: Create a gallery item

permissions.name: Manage Galleries
permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's Pro Galleries.

params.name: galleryId
params.doc: ID of the gallery to delete.

docs.summary:
Deletes a gallery.

>**Notes:**
> * The deleted gallery appears as an empty widget on the live site.
> * The deleted gallery is no longer retrieved when calling the [List Galleries](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/list-galleries) endpoint.
>

permissions.description: Request permission to manage the site's Pro Galleries.

params.doc: ID of the media item to delete.

docs.summary:
Updates a media item in a specified gallery.

 > **Note:** When creating or updating image items in a pro gallery, the images must be uploaded or imported to the [Wix Media Manager](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/media/media-manager) first, as the `imageInfo` parameter currently only supports the Wix Media URL.

examples.title: Update an item in a gallery

docs.summary:
Triggered when a gallery is created.

> __Note:__ The event data doesn't include gallery items or their IDs.
> To receive information about the created items you need to listen to the [Gallery Item Created webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/gallery-item-created-webhook).

permissions.name: Read Galleries
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's Pro Galleries.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a gallery is updated.

> __Note:__ The event data doesn't include gallery items or their IDs.
> To receive information about the updated items you need to listen to the [Gallery Item Updated webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/gallery-item-updated-webhook).

docs.summary:
Triggered when a media item in a specified gallery is deleted.

> __Note:__ The event is triggered when a gallery item is deleted individually and when a gallery item is deleted because its gallery is deleted.
> The property `originatedFrom` has the value `Gallery Deleted` if the entire gallery is deleted. If the gallery item is deleted individually, this field is empty.

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia ID. Required when associating an existing Wix Media video.

members.name: url
members.doc: Video URL. Required when associating a video from an external source. Supported sources: YouTube, Vimeo.

members.name: resolutions
members.doc: Available resolutions for the video, starting with the optimal resolution.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Index that determines which position a media item is displayed in the gallery.
Default: [Epoch](https://www.epoch101.com/) timestamp.
>**Note:** If you assign the same sort order index to more than one media item in a gallery, the function fails.

members.name: link
members.doc: Link from the item. You can link to Wix sites or external URLs.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the item was last updated.

members.name: values
members.doc: List of tags assigned to the media item.

members.name: imageInfo
members.doc: Information about the Wix Media image.

members.name: exif
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs describing the media in [Exchangeable Image File format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exif).

members.name: amount
members.doc:
Unsharp masking amount. Controls the sharpening strength.
Min: `0`
Max: `5`

members.name: radius
members.doc: Unsharp masking radius in pixels. Controls the sharpening width.

members.name: threshold
members.doc:
Unsharp masking threshold. Controls how different neighboring pixels must be for shapening to apply.
Min: `0`
Max: `1`

members.name: durationInMillis
members.doc: Manually defined video duration in milliseconds.

members.name: css
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs describing the [CSS style](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CSS) of the text.

__Note:__ The object structure is customizable. See the [List Gallery Items](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/site-content/pro-gallery/list-gallery-items) code example for supported values.

members.name: totalItems
members.doc: Total number of items in the gallery.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc:
Index that determines which position a gallery is displayed on the site.
>**Note:** If you assign the same sort order index to more than one gallery, the function fails.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the gallery was created.

members.name: itemId
members.doc: ID of the deleted gallery item.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: itemLimit
members.doc:
Maximum number of media items to return.
Min: `1`
Max: `100`
Default: `10`

members.name: offset
members.doc:
Number of galleries to skip in the response.
Default: `0`

members.name: limit
members.doc:
Maximum number of galleries to return.
Min: `1`
Max: `10`
Default: `10`

members.name: totalGalleries
members.doc: Total number of galleries in the site.

members.name: itemOffset
members.doc:
Number of media items to skip in the response.
Default: `0`

members.name: itemLimit
members.doc:
Maximum number of media items to return.
Min: `1`
Max: `100`
Default: `50`

members.name: itemLimit

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • IMAGE
  • VIDEO
  • TEXT

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • WIX_MEDIA
  • EXTERNAL

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • WIX_MEDIA
  • YOUTUBE
  • VIMEO

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • EXTERNAL - external link
  • INTERNAL - for internal usage using wixLinkData

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SAVED - The gallery in the Editor segment
  • PUBLISHED - The gallery in the LiveSite segment
